page.title: 10THE BEACON SURVEY 2
page.content:
4.If you don't go to the Beacon very often, what do you not like about it? (A).The other people......=1 person (B).Need an adult for some activities............=1 person (C).Costs too much........=1 person (D).The surroundings......=2 people (E).Dislike nothing.......=3 people 5.In general how do you feel about the Beacon? Would you say you are (A).Very satisfied........=0 people (B).Satisfied.............=9 people (C).Dissatisfied..........=2 people (D).Very dissatisfied.....=0 people (E).Don't know anything about it..............=5 people
Conclusion: Generally most people seem to be satisfied.
